resources.string: Speedglobal Telecom Network Pvt. Ltd. was founded in 2017, serving plenty of corporate and adding more to it. Speedglobal Telecom Network Pvt. Ltd. holds an Internet Service Provider license and is successfully executing projects across the country, with its corporate office in Mumbai. The company has grown multifold within a very short time period. Speedglobal Telecom Network Pvt. Ltd. is among the leading ISPs and has over 1,000 unique clients in different business sectors.Speedglobal Telecom Network Pvt. Ltd. has state of art Internet Data Center facilities in 6 cities. These data sectors are built using the world\'s best technologies and are equipped with security, monitoring and management systems to highest standard to adequately support mission critical customers applications.
